title: Why i hate yasuo.
body:
his E
just remove that ability thx 
it is just annoying when yasuo keeps dashing in lane , rest is fine

replies.body: windwall that makes every ranged champ useless, passive shield that soaks up 43283293849 damage, unlimited dashes, free crit... :^) balanced

1. "windwall that makes every ranged champ useless" for 4 seconds in 2 directions.

2. "passive shield that soaks up 43283293849 damage" yeah hiperbole is strong in this one.

3.  "unlimited dashes" needs a target, Fiora's are closer to unlimited than Yasuo's.

I mean, Yasuo isn't a pleasant champion to face, but hiperboling everything to get you point straight is just BS...

I could make AP Yorick seem like the most broken toxic champion in the game if I did it like you did.

Well, Yasuo's dashes are not unlimited, but sure as hell they are cancer to face, and I would argue that they are still broken even if not unlimited. Especially since Yasuo can max E; it has a 10 seconds cooldown at level 1, 6 when maxed. With that in mind, Yasuo can still use his E to dash on you, trade, and get away without giving you the chance to trade back (similar to Renekton, especially since Yasuo can use his third Q knockup against you when he dashes) Considering the fact that new minion waves come every few seconds, Yasuo still has a lot of dashes to use during the lane phase, and this can get worse with every level.
I concur, but hiperbolizing it to the point where it seems completely broken is not the solution.

although to be fair, if you look at what he could do before he does it and prepare yourself it can turn the trade in your favor. One of his biggest strengths are those quick engages before the enemy can notice.
all these monkeys complaining about Yasou's mobility, but Fiora over there dashing wherever the hell she wants. At least get your priorities in order.

> [{quoted}](name=MistakenKing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LvEUgH9Y,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-08-19T16:49:04.117+0000)
>
> all these monkeys complaining about Yasou's mobility, but Fiora over there dashing wherever the hell she wants. At least get your priorities in order.

I would much rather face a yasuo than a fiora because yasuo is easier to deal with. so i agree.
Right? Yasuo pick volibear and beg for him to dash to you.... Fiora ew the percent health damage.... :(
Fiora has real Cooldowns. Yasuo's E is 0.1 sec.

Not like Fiora gets a 60% CD reduction off her dash just by hitting something off it. Minions are so OP I can dash when there are multiply enemies around in an unpredictable way, just busted. At least she doesn't have an ability that is better than being able to block all damage and CC that is also CC. That wind wall is just has no counter play and is unmatched. Highly conditional 50% armor pen is so broken compared to % health true damage that gives health and move speed.
No, you should play Yas and learn his E.
One of the most unfun champs in the game to play against along with Ekko, LB and Fizz.
yeah i mean his w that makes some champs entire kits useless for 4 seconds is fine

Because it's fucking impossible to walk around it....

/s
yea walk straight into melee range against someone with 100% crit chance and a knockup

You don't know how to sidestep that shit? Really? SERIOUSLY? REALLY?

REALLY?

Is it honestly that hard to walk around it? are you kidding me?

No but seriously walk around it jeez, it's not even hard.
Then he just walks to the other side of it or just sits on top of it.
And then you realize you can bait it. And wait it out.

Increase his cooldowns, increase his E cooldown and increase that stupidly low cd ult cooldown. For an ult that gets to be activated by anyone with a knockup it shouldn't also have such a low cd attached to it.

*poof*
now he is a garbage champion that can't be good. 
His tank build is getting nerfed. Riot has stated that it is

>now he is a garbage champion that can't be good.

Good. Can we break his legs as well?

Balancing isn't nerfing a champion into shit tier... 

unless it's simply impossible to balance. And that's not yasuo's case.

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LvEUgH9Y,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-08-19T16:32:43.988+0000)
>
> Good. Can we break his legs as well?

I like the way you think
No?
Has 0 dashes when he's not in a minion wave. Learn to play
I love how the immediate reaction from Yasuo fans is "HUR U NO KNOW HOW 2 PLAY AGAINST HIM QQ MORE" as if hating a champion's design is an impossibility.

There's a difference between disliking a design and not knowing how to fight it. I don't play yasuo, but I've fought him enough to where I don't have a problem against him. If you're having trouble you either got counter picked or need to work on your skills in that matchup.

I know how to fight him, I like tilting the shit out of them with Voli and chasing them down top lane biting their heads off under their tier 2 turret. I still think Yasuo is  one of Riot's biggest mistakes to introduce to League.

> [{quoted}](name=Keevalroy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LvEUgH9Y,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2016-08-19T19:52:46.528+0000)
>
> I love how the immediate reaction from Yasuo fans is "HUR U NO KNOW HOW 2 PLAY AGAINST HIM QQ MORE" as if hating a champion's design is an impossibility.

Love how you're unranked, have never played Yasuo, and in the Bronze ELO yet you are trying to argue with a Plat Urgot/Yasuo main about balance. Right now Frozen Mallet is stupid, not Yasuo. Frozen mallet is OP on every champ in the game right now.

I was gold the previous two seasons?  I _have_ played Yasuo, but not ranked which wouldn't show up, and no, I'm not arguing about balance. That's you jumping to conclusions since I dared to speak ill of Yasuo.  In no part of that comment did I mention anything about winrates, balance, statistics, or him being overpowered at all.  I'm only agreeing with the OP that he's infuriating to deal with.  Does that mean he's completely unbeatable?  No, people just hate seeing him.  And do you really think this is a completely serious thread?  The OP is suggesting an ability is extremely annoying and highlighting why, not _literally_ asking for the removal of the ability.

> [{quoted}](name=Keevalroy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LvEUgH9Y,comment-id=000f000000010000,timestamp=2016-08-20T03:13:16.535+0000)
>
> I was gold the previous two seasons?  I _have_ played Yasuo, but not ranked which wouldn't show up, and no, I'm not arguing about balance. That's you jumping to conclusions since I dared to speak ill of Yasuo.  In no part of that comment did I mention anything about winrates, balance, statistics, or him being overpowered at all.  I'm only agreeing with the OP that he's infuriating to deal with.  Does that mean he's completely unbeatable?  No, people just hate seeing him.  And do you really think this is a completely serious thread?  The OP is suggesting an ability is extremely annoying and highlighting why, not _literally_ asking for the removal of the ability.

Itemization is broken right now, not Yasuo.
And that has nothing to do with my response but okay?

> [{quoted}](name=Keevalroy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LvEUgH9Y,comment-id=000f00000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-20T03:26:24.307+0000)
>
> And that has nothing to do with my response but okay?

It does. He's not an annoying champ to play against at all. Him perm slowing with Mallet is annoying as fuck while having infinite movement speed from  Tri-force and having a fuckton of dmg from Gage.

>He's not an annoying champ to play against at all. 

That's entirely subjective from the perspective of the one playing against him...as it is with any champion in any situation.
Brilliant! I'll fight him in the jungle then.

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LvEUgH9Y,comment-id=000f0001,timestamp=2016-08-20T02:24:18.334+0000)
>
> Brilliant! I'll fight him in the jungle then.

You kite him away from dashing points and you move horizontally while he uses his Q's. Right now Frozen Mallet is aids on every champ so you can't blame Tank Yas for being OP when Riot makes the items OP. I mained Yas when he was a super squishy assassin where his core build was Hydra, IE, Shiv, BORK, and QSS.

learn to position and track his dash cooldown.

people are always talking as if yasuo is the most mobile chmpion in the game, when hes quite predictable.

{{champion:38}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:236}} 

are far more mobile since theyre not restricted to targeting enemy units. they can spam their mobility in any direction.

^^^^ UPVOTE HARD

At least critmaster isn't on the hyperbolic yasuo hate train :   ^)

You know what I really hate about Kha'zix? His E. just remove that ability thx
it is just annoying when Kha keeps jumping in teamfights  , rest is fine
I hate him because of his double crit
Dat 0.1 Second CD is hard.
he does have counterplay tho, just annoying to lane against
I rather his E having an ammo cap, like 5 stacks, and each stack refreshes every X seconds.
*poof* done

People that pick him in ranked and have no idea how to use him is worse than anything. Had a Yasuo in my last game with no damage (straight Shiv), no kills, and maxed WINDWALL first.

EDIT: I think he's boosted. He has some games were he goes 26-1, and others where he legit goes 3-6 or 0-5.
So a dash that needs enemies is bad but Fiora's Q is fine?

I honestly don't mind his E, I just feel like his E Q spin knockup combo has no counterplay.  I feel like he should only be able to get the knockup if he hits with his skill shot Q.  As a compensation maybe make it so if he does his spin Q he gets a different benefit instead (increased damage, refresh on flow, etc.) This would actually make him a more interested champion to play or play against because Yasuo could choose how he wants to use his Q (kind of like how the new Ryze works with rune/spell flux.)

You wanna know something? He's a melee squishy fighter with no burst, what the fuck do you expect him to do without his mobility? He can barely escape ganks,  (Unless you're pure shit and he outplays you hard) camp his fucking ass...
While I hate Yasuo a lot,his E can be fixed if it was either just utility, had a limit, or actual cooldown.

This is easily fixed. Just remove his E like you suggested...and his Q, and that fucking W, and the ult, and all of his passives...then his icon so people can't choose him, and his model and voice lines after that.  

There. Problem solved, and League is now so much brighter without him.
